nodes.text: Some time during 1 ABY, Klaphini traveled to a city on Tatooine with a group of fellow smugglers. Not long after, a bounty hunter named Tearfin located Klaphini and her associates, suspecting her of being a thief who stole some valuable equipment.

Tearfin interrogated Klaphini, but could not determine whether she was innocent or guilty. A spacer eventually came along to help Tearfin. After interrogating all the smugglers, the spacer cleared Klaphini of any suspicions, concluding that Rh'klin was in fact the thief.

Klaphini is a Non-Player Characters (NPC's) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. She periodically spawns in random cities across Tatooine, along with Tearfin and the five other smugglers. Players taking part in the "Hero of Tatooine" quest-line must interrogate Klaphini and the other smugglers, to determine which one is Tearfin's mark.
Due to the nature of the game, Klaphini's appearance fluctuates, but she is always a female.
